# Managing Your Projects

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/managing-your-projects-in-fortnite-creative>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-26T22:59:35.636958

---

Learn how to manage your projects using Creator Portal, including an explanation of the project navigation menu, and descriptions of the analytics page for your project, the page showing any in-game offers in your project, and the Verse runtime errors page. You can also learn about sharing links, and A/B testing for your islands' thumbnail images.

[![Project Navigation Menu](https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/af896d74-94ae-4bd7-97d6-4e09b582d141?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640)

Project Navigation Menu

Everything you need to manage a project once you select it from the Project page.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/project-navigation-menu-in-fortnite)[![Project> Analytics](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/9056a4a9-3284-4054-a4e6-3086e95e1b98?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Project Analytics

Use these metrics to gain insight into how players respond to your thumbnails and descriptions, and how long they stick to your island.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/project-analytics-for-fortnite-games)[![Verse> Runtime Error Reporting](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/dfb303dd-20d8-42df-9e1c-41e0278ca09a?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Verse Runtime Error Reporting

Review all runtime errors in Creator Portal to see where your Verse code needs work.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-runtime-error-reporting-in-fortnite-creative)[![Links>](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/5f721c79-ac59-465e-9d52-e247dc0dd7cc?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

Links

Provide a direct island link that lets players or teammates jump directly into an island made by you!](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/links-in-fortnite-creative)[![A/B> Thumbnail Testing](<https://dev.epicgames.com/community/api/documentation/image/e45b1f8d-732a-4d7d-b0d1-110d4d070304?resizing_type=fit&width=640&height=640>)

A/B Thumbnail Testing

A/B Test your thumbnails to find an image that increases your click-through rate.](<https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/ab-thumbnail-testing-in-fortnite-creative>)
